name: Stahlregen - splash! (Tricolor Spiral)
milkdrop_raw:

b2x=1.000
b3x=1.000
b1ed=0.250
wavecode_0_enabled=0

wavecode_0_g=1.000
wavecode_0_b=1.000
wavecode_0_a=1.000
wavecode_1_enabled=0
wavecode_1_samples=512
wavecode_1_sep=0
wavecode_1_bSpectrum=0
wavecode_1_bUseDots=0
wavecode_1_bDrawThick=0
wavecode_1_bAdditive=0
wavecode_1_scaling=1.00000
wavecode_1_smoothing=0.50000
wavecode_1_r=1.000
wavecode_1_g=1.000
wavecode_1_b=1.000
wavecode_1_a=1.000
wavecode_2_enabled=0
wavecode_2_samples=512
wavecode_2_sep=0
wavecode_2_bSpectrum=0
wavecode_2_bUseDots=0
wavecode_2_bDrawThick=0

wavecode_3_bDrawThick=0

wavecode_3_smoothing=0.50000
wavecode_3_r=1.000
wavecode_3_g=1.000
wavecode_3_b=1.000
wavecode_3_a=1.000
shapecode_0_enabled=0
shapecode_0_sides=4
shapecode_0_additive=0
shapecode_0_thickOutline=0
shapecode_0_textured=0
shapecode_0_num_inst=1
shapecode_0_x=0.500
shapecode_0_y=0.500
shapecode_0_rad=0.04020
shapecode_0_ang=0.00000
shapecode_0_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_0_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_0_r=0.000
shapecode_0_g=0.000
shapecode_0_b=0.000
shapecode_0_a=1.000
shapecode_0_r2=0.000
shapecode_0_g2=1.000
shapecode_0_b2=0.000
shapecode_0_a2=0.000
shapecode_0_border_r=1.000
shapecode_0_border_g=1.000
shapecode_0_border_b=1.000
shapecode_0_border_a=0.000
shape_0_per_frame1=delay = 1-q1;
shape_0_per_frame2=counter = if(equal(delay,0),counter+1,counter);
shape_0_per_frame3=counter = if(equal(counter,7),1,counter);
shape_0_per_frame4=
shape_0_per_frame5=r = .5*below(counter,4)+.25*above(counter,5);
shape_0_per_frame6=g = .5*above(counter,1)*below(counter,5)-.25*equal(counter,2);
shape_0_per_frame7=b = .5*above(counter,4)-.25*equal(counter,7);
shape_0_per_frame8=
shape_0_per_frame9=r2=r;g2=g;b2=b;
shape_0_per_frame10=
shape_0_per_frame11=rad = 0.04;
shapecode_1_enabled=1
shapecode_1_sides=100
shapecode_1_additive=0
shapecode_1_thickOutline=0
shapecode_1_textured=1
shapecode_1_num_inst=1
shapecode_1_x=0.500
shapecode_1_y=0.500
shapecode_1_rad=0.77661
shapecode_1_ang=1.57080
shapecode_1_tex_ang=1.25664
shapecode_1_tex_zoom=1.19615
shapecode_1_r=1.000
shapecode_1_g=1.000
shapecode_1_b=1.000
shapecode_1_a=1.000
shapecode_1_r2=1.000
shapecode_1_g2=1.000
shapecode_1_b2=1.000
shapecode_1_a2=0.000
shapecode_1_border_r=1.000
shapecode_1_border_g=1.000
shapecode_1_border_b=1.000
shapecode_1_border_a=0.000
shapecode_2_enabled=0
shapecode_2_sides=4
shapecode_2_additive=0
shapecode_2_thickOutline=0
shapecode_2_textured=0
shapecode_2_num_inst=1
shapecode_2_x=0.500
shapecode_2_y=0.500
shapecode_2_rad=0.10000
shapecode_2_ang=0.00000
shapecode_2_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_2_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_2_r=1.000
shapecode_2_g=0.000
shapecode_2_b=0.000
shapecode_2_a=1.000
shapecode_2_r2=0.000
shapecode_2_g2=1.000
shapecode_2_b2=0.000
shapecode_2_a2=0.000
shapecode_2_border_r=1.000
shapecode_2_border_g=1.000
shapecode_2_border_b=1.000
shapecode_2_border_a=0.100
shapecode_3_enabled=0
shapecode_3_sides=4
shapecode_3_additive=0
shapecode_3_thickOutline=0
shapecode_3_textured=0
shapecode_3_num_inst=1
shapecode_3_x=0.500
shapecode_3_y=0.500
shapecode_3_rad=0.10000
shapecode_3_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_3_r=1.000
shapecode_3_g=0.000
shapecode_3_b=0.000
shapecode_3_a=1.000
shapecode_3_r2=0.000
shapecode_3_g2=1.000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000
shapecode_3_a2=0.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=warp = 0;
per_frame_2=
per_frame_3=// <<-- Stahlregen's (off)beat detection 
per_frame_4=// frame counter for average
per_frame_5=count = count+1;
per_frame_6=// counters of the bass/treb/mid values for average
per_frame_7=bc = bc+bass;
per_frame_8=tc = tc+treb;
per_frame_9=mc = mc+mid;
per_frame_10=// checking for impact: highest of bass/mid/treb has impact
per_frame_11=bimp = if(above(3.25*bass,bass+treb+mid),1,0);
per_frame_12=timp = if(above(2.75*treb,bass+treb+mid),1,0);
per_frame_13=mimp = if(above(2.75*mid,bass+treb+mid),1,0);
per_frame_14=// checking for beats: compare adjusted buffered 
per_frame_15=// vs. average value and check for impact
per_frame_16=is_beat = if(above(.75*bass,bc/count),1*bimp,
per_frame_17=if(above(.75*treb,tc/count),1*timp,
per_frame_18=if(above(.75*mid,mc/count),1*mimp,
per_frame_19=0))); 
per_frame_20=// restricting max number of beats per second (fraction of fps)
per_frame_21=is_beat = if(above(reha,0),0,is_beat);
per_frame_22=reha = if(is_beat,fps*.25,if(below(reha,1),0,reha-1));
per_frame_23=// end of (off)beat detection -->
per_frame_24=
per_frame_25=fade = if(is_beat,100+fade,.9*fade-1);
per_frame_26=
per_frame_27=fade = if(below(fade,1),0,fade);
per_frame_28=
per_frame_29=zoom = 1.01+.001*fade;
per_frame_30=
per_frame_31=
per_frame_32=wave_r = .5+.5*sin(time);
per_frame_33=wave_g = .5+.5*sin(time*1.53);
per_frame_34=wave_b = .5+.5*sin(time*2.02);
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`
warp_4=`   // sample previous frame
warp_5=`ret = tex2D( sampler_fc_main, lerp(uv,uv_orig,.15)).xyz;
warp_6=`
warp_7=`ret.x += frac(GetPixel(uv+float2(1,2)*texsize.zw*GetPixel(uv).x).x);
warp_8=`ret.x -= GetBlur3(uv).x;
warp_9=`
warp_10=`ret.y += frac(GetPixel(uv+float2(2,-2)*texsize.zw*GetPixel(uv).y).y);
warp_11=`ret.y -= GetBlur3(uv).y;
warp_12=`
warp_13=`ret.z += frac(GetPixel(uv+float2(-2,-1)*texsize.zw*GetPixel(uv).z).z);
warp_14=`ret.z -= GetBlur3(uv).z;
warp_15=`
warp_16=`
warp_17=`    // darken (decay) over time
warp_18=`    ret = (ret*0.95)-.002; //or try: ret -= 0.004;
warp_19=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`
comp_4=`ret = lerp(0,1.5,GetPixel(uv).z);
comp_5=`ret = lerp(ret,float3(.5,.5,.5),GetPixel(uv).x);
comp_6=`ret = lerp(ret,float3(2,0,0),GetPixel(uv).y);
comp_7=` ret *= 1.00; //gamma
comp_8=`}
